#include <iostream>
#include <map>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
 
using namespace std;
 
string func(string s)
{
                   string s1;
                   int t = 0;
                   while ( s[t] != '$' ) {
                           s1.push_back(s[t]);
                           t++;
                   }
                   return s1;
}
 
float num(string s)
{
               float n = 0;
               int i = 0,j;
               while ( s[i] != '$' ) i++;
               for ( j = i+1; j < s.size(); j++ ) n = n*10 + s[j]-48;
               return n;
}
 
int main()
{
    string s1,s2,s3;
    int i,k,j;
    float l;
     
    map <string,string> m;
    
    for ( ;; ) {
             cin >> s1;
             if ( s1 == "000000" ) break;
             cin >> s2;
             m[s1] = s2;
    }
    s2.clear();
    for ( ;; ) {
             cin >> s1;
             if ( s1 == "#" ) break;
             scanf("%d", &k);
             cout << s1 << " ";
             i = 0;
             
             if ( s1[0] != '0' ) {
                        cout << "Local " << s1 << " " << k << " 0.00 0.00" << endl;
                        goto p;
             }
             
             while ( m[s3] == "" && i < s1.size() ) {
                     s3.push_back(s1[i]);
                     i++;
             }
             if ( m[s3] == "" ) {
                        cout << "Unknown " << k << " -1.00" << endl;
                        goto p;
             }           
             
             for ( j = i; j < s1.size(); j++ ) s2.push_back(s1[j]);
             l = num(m[s3]);
             l = (float)(l)/(float)(100);
             cout << func(m[s3]) << " " << s2 << " " << k << " ";
             cout << fixed << setprecision(2) << l << " " << (float)(l*k) << endl;
             p: { }
             s3.clear();
             s2.clear();
    }
    
    return 0;
}
